function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of knowledge about COVID-19 symptoms and transmission","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding leading to incorrect preventative measures","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, distribution of accurate information","Technologies":"Online platforms, social media, television","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Downplaying the risk of contagious diseases","Impact":"Reduced adherence to preventative measures and behavioral changes","Mitigation":"Education on risk perception, targeted messaging to raise awareness","Technologies":"Behavioral psychology interventions, public health communication strategies","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health agencies, government, educators, community advocates"},{"Description":"Incorrect risk perception leading to lack of preventative actions","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Public education, awareness campaigns, enforcement of health guidelines","Technologies":"Data analytics for risk assessment, mobile health applications","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government, community organizations"}]}
